title: Healthier Kedgeree
ingredients: ['350g (12oz) undyed smoked haddock', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 small onions, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '175g (6oz) brown rice, rinsed', '1 tablespoon tomato purée', '250g (9oz) spinach leaves', '4 tablespoons low-fat Greek-style yoghurt', 'Salt and black pepper', '4 hard-boiled eggs, quartered']
